author: hope is something you give yourself.
whether you make it or not.
or if it’s because I’m strong enough not to.
Zuko. Being part of the group also means being part of group hugs.
and guys are better at hunting and fighting and stuff like that. It’s just the natural order of things.
we exchange a pleasant “hello” before asking questions.
but I knew I’d know it when I knew it!
you have to let go of fear.
we are open to the greatest change.
but you have no interest in this so I have no interest in you.
